body.p:
Richmond Ky
July 22nd 1861
Jas W. Tate Esqr
Dear Sir
Yours of the 19th Inst -- was duly recvd
I have inquired of of the clerk of the Madison County Court & he informs me that E. K. Howard the Justice who has resigned resides, & was formerly magistrate, in the 8th District of Madison County --

The Rev. statutes of Ky makes it necessary for a vacancy in the office of Justice of the Peace to be filled by the appointment of the Governor
temporarily until the next succeeding May or August election whichever shall first transpire -- As it is now but a few days until the August election it will be impossible to have an election for Justice this year in the 8th district You will therefore oblige both W. S. Taylor & myself by issuing the Commission So that the election will come on next year
